Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for the size and price!
Reviews.Author: D. bair
Reviews.Content: This Hitachi 40" television is great. The picture quality is super. The sound is great also. I'm on a budget and after doing a month research on various televisions until I decided on this one,I'm well pleased. Now will it hold up? I hope to get many years of good service out of this television. The price is the best compared to other televisions of the same size. I would recommend this tv to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Majed M. AlJuailan
Reviews.Content: This TV is really nice especially with its reasonable price. The price was almost the lowest when compared with other 40" LCD tvs, but it had some features many others didn't.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: sagespyder
Reviews.Content: My mom's old tv broke so I decided to buy her a new tv for X-mas. After doing many searches I came across this one. It is my mom's first flat screen and she loved it when it was delivered. I visited during X-mas and after buying her an HDMI cable you can really tell the difference and she was even happier. The only problem was the sound since the speakers are in the back but I intended on buying her a sound bar anyways. She loves her new tv and I believe that the tv fits anyone not too picky about name brands and needs to save some money.

Reviews.Title: Hitachi 40" Class LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Emmalena M. Nowacki "Emmalena M. Nowacki"
Reviews.Content: Can;t believe how sharp the picture is.  We really like it.  The sound is great and the price was super!

Reviews.Title: High quality TV
Reviews.Author: jane
Reviews.Content: Sound is very good. Good picture. Has swivel built in so can turn screen for viewing in different direction. Have always liked Hitachi but difficult to find in stores now. Customer service told me Sam,s Club was only outlet. I bought mine at Amazon and packaging was excellent
